name: Attack Of Hecking Huge Veggies (and also eggs!)
name_original: Attack Of Hecking Huge Veggies (and also eggs!)
description:
They attack

why? nobody knows, what runs in their veggie juiced minds! (and eggs just for company :)

You must protect

why? you are the head of chiefs, of course. You are have mastered the art of trowing knives at useless trash, as your subordinates are, so throwing knives at some veggies (and eggs, yeah) should be no problem for you. Plus this is YOUR kitchen, you have the same type of blood with it - ketchup.

Explore your kitchen

it's huge, and with a lot of bad veggies(and eggs) coming for you, you have no other choice but to constantly move. 

Controls

Move with WASD (or with arrows, if you like THAT)

Point at veggies (and eggs) with mouse

Left click to throw knives

And that's it!

if you actually going to play this, send your best score in the comments please!
